welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Triangle, where southern charm meets urban sophistication! Get ready to experience our vibrant city known for its delicious food, rich history, and endless outdoor activities. We can't wait for you to explore and enjoy all that Triangle has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport, serving all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves primarily Delta and American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves primarily United and Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B handles domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C serves both domestic and international flights and is connected to the main terminal via an underground walkway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
